= 2 Advanced Widgets =

This is the list of widgets present in crux-advanced-widgets.jar:

|| *Type* || *Widget* || *Brief description* ||
||collapsePanel||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.collapsepanel.CollapsePanel||A TitlePanel capable of folding itself, hiding its contents||
||decoratedButton||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.decoratedbutton.DecoratedButton||A button based on a 3x1 table, useful for building rounded corners||
||decoratedPanel||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.decoratedpanel.DecoratedPanel||Much like GWT's DecoratorPanel||
||dynaTabs||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.dynatabs.DynaTabs||A tabbed set of pages, each of which can display html pages|| 
||maskedTextBox||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.maskedtextbox.MaskedTextBox||A text box capable of validating and masking user input||
||scrollBanner||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.scrollbanner.ScrollBanner||A panel which displays sequential text messages, switching between them periodically||
||stackMenu||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.stackmenu.StackMenu||A vertical accordion menu||
||timer||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.timer.Timer||A label that shows the elapsed time and fires scheduled events||
||titlePanel||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.titlepanel.TitlePanel||A DecoratedPanel which has a title label|| 
||transferList||br.com.sysmap.crux.advanced.client.transferlist.TransferList||Two side-by-side list boxes which can exchange their items||
